lender.occupational_info: Their living status in the country is not a hindrance for them to ask for tax relief from IRSLargely, because they are also taxed according to the general income taxation laws, likewise, the same for all other taxesThese people are called legal aliens in the country, and can stay for three years up to six yearsWhile in the country, they can also avail certain government benefits and grants, like everyone elseNominate an executor, appointed and supervised by the probate court, to manage your estate, pay debts and expenses, pay taxes, and distribute your estate in an accountable manner and in accordance with your will Roth 401k is a good retirement savings optionAlthough it does not provide an up-front tax-deduction, the account eventually becomes tax-free, because the withdrawals taken at retirement are not subject to income taxRecently, the OIG acknowledged that many projects on which it intends to focus in FY 2008 pose management and performance challenges that must be addressed with novel strategies, in addition to the current management strategies the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) has implementedThe OIG published a publication, Top Management and Performance Challenges, which is available from OIGs website, and outlines these management challenges and the steps the OIG is taking to address these challengesThis tax benefit can only be provided to persons who are at least 59.5 years old, or are disabled, and who have held the account for a minimum period of five yearsRoth 401k provides an opportunity to save with a different kind of tax treatmentIt is a good option for those who are just starting their careers, and expect their income to grow in the futureNow, if poor people get so financially stressed when IRS demands payment on tax debts, rich people have these tooWhy so? Spouses and ex-spouses of delinquent tax payers are also offered federal tax relief when they are being forced to make payments on a tax debt that is not their ownAlthough in many locations a married coupleâs finances and debts are filed together, in some cases one spouse is in no way at fault for the tax debt and is eligible for the Innocent Spouse ProgramThis clears the non-faulted party of any debt to the federal government that was incurred by the guilty spouse

lender.name: Valdemar
lender.loan_because:
I want to be against others as I want other people to be against me. Each according to his/hers needs and his/hers ability. This is my: Dreams: Become a married couple, and slowly change the world step by step together; Furthermore, from simplistic materialism, over consumption of pension and profit-focused capitalism, to more a more equitable distribution policy, human spirituality and sustainability of agriculture and natural. Goals: Living for others and serve you as best I can. Combine work and business with pleasure. Learn life and die happy! Interests: Mainly God, human living traditions and culture. Geographic preferences are in and around Thailand, India (mainly Kerela, or Agra), and southeast China, but maybe even South America.
I would begin by helping farmers as effectively as possible in their base business of food prouktion, to greater economic independence and autonomy, as well as through loan create the opportunity to visit the project personally, when I travel slowly and stays long in most places I visit, to gather facts and information, the working documents for me. So-called investigative journalism. China is where I have been most in recent years, with bla farmers in poor Gansu province in the north. Now I want to also build an alternative home and life in one of these places I chose. The idea is to live some kind of 6 months life, commuting between Sweden and this home base place. Perhaps I can in my travels around 6 months of helping those in need to post their loan claims here at Kiva MicrolÃ¥n? Is there such a need?
lender.occupational_info: I am a JACK OF ALL TRADES and life artist, and old professional officer in the Swedish army, who is now retraining myself to Humanist teachers at the age of 42, while I am working as quality-oriented freelance journalist without economic pressure, because I have a small but solid monthly income from the Swedish State. I'm international and work now global where I serve all people, who want's and needs.

lender.name: Odko
lender.loan_because: My uncle Boldbaatar is in a desperate need of fund.
lender.occupational_info: My uncle Mr Boldbaatar lives with his wife, daughter and grand - daughter in Mongolian traditional house Ger. Since he became pensioner, he tried to find a job, but the age was the main problem. Then he bought few pigs on the money that he had, and started his subsistence Pig Framing business with 8 pigs in rented pig shelter. The shelter was not technically for pigs, so the winter 2009-2010 became the worst ever winter for him. All piglets have died (30), pigs have lost their weights, and mostly they were nearly frozen, as the winter in Mongolia is about â 40 C. Now as the summer coming, he wishes to build a shelter for his remaining pigs, warm enough to get thru any winter and grow his pigs and coming piglets to make the business out of it. This is the time for him to prepare for the winter times and build a proper shelter for his Pig Farm. His family is in a very need of fund to build a shelter for pigs. For this he needs to buy all necessary parts and equipments. If he wonât be able to build a shelter, the pigs are not able to survive anymore winters. He really needs to overcome this situation and make this business to go, as he doesnât have other choices. Please help them to raise the fund of $2500 and he will be able to repay within 2 years. Thank you.

lender.loan_because: I want to invest in people that have great ideas and great plans in any part of the world. I'm not made of money but I have some extra.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: My daughter has a world wide interest in micro finance. She got me started as a Christmas gift.
